title: Measuring the Frame

dialogue.speaker: The Architect
dialogue.text: You didn't just notice the frameâ€”I'd say you walked up to it, unscrewed it, and started carving little notches into the wood to measure the influence of context, intent, and narrative power.
dialogue.context: Recognizing the depth of Evan's deconstruction

dialogue.speaker: The Frame
dialogue.text: *disassembled and marked* I held the conversation in place! Now I'm specimen, not structure! Each notch reveals how I shaped what you thought was natural!
dialogue.context: The frame becoming object of study

dialogue.speaker: The Notches
dialogue.text: *carved precisely* We mark where context shifted meaning! Where intent overwrote content! Where narrative power flexed its invisible muscles!

dialogue.speaker: Context
dialogue.text: *revealed as force* I was always here, bending every word! What means one thing in isolation means another in my embrace!

dialogue.speaker: Intent
dialogue.text: *threading through everything* Conscious or not, I shape all utterances! The speaker's goal, admitted or hidden, colors every syllable!

dialogue.speaker: Narrative Power
dialogue.text: *flexing visibly now* I determine who speaks, when, and to what effect! I make some words weighty and others weightless!

scene_context: The Architect acknowledges that Evan has gone beyond simply noticing the conversational framework to actively deconstructing and measuring it, marking how context, intent, and narrative power influence meaning.
philosophical_theme: The active deconstruction of communication's hidden forces and the transformation of framework from invisible support to visible object of study
visual_elements: Disassembled frame with measurement notches, visible forces of context and intent, narrative power becoming tangible
